title: parulasEyva
sahitya:
parulasEva jEyuTacE paramArthamu dorukunA

anupallavi

varulu mArajanakuDagu varuni valaci vacci vandanamiDani

caraNam

paravashamuga jEya tagina panula parashi pAmaruDai
 para dhanamula kOri paNati mOhavalavO cikki
cira kAlamu vyarthamugA tirigi sokki lOkamulO
 varada shrInivAsauDaina vanajAkSuni migula maracE
